description: Documentation Overhaul - Comprehensive READMEs for Root, Backend, and Frontend.

userStories.title: Root README and Architecture Diagrams
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a high-level overview of the system so that I understand how the pieces fit together.
acceptanceCriteria: Include Project Title 'AI Troubleshooting Agent' and Description
Include 'Quick Start' section using Docker Compose
Include a Mermaid diagram showing the high-level data flow (User -> Frontend -> Backend -> Orchestrator -> LLM)
Include a Mermaid diagram showing the Agentic workflow or Sub-Agent routing logic

userStories.title: Backend Microservice Documentation
userStories.description: As a backend developer, I want to understand the API and internals of the backend service so I can extend it.
acceptanceCriteria: Document how to add new tools or sub-agents
userStories.notes: Created comprehensive backend/README.md covering API, Config, and Architecture.

userStories.title: Frontend Microservice Documentation
userStories.description: As a frontend developer, I want to understand the Streamlit application structure so I can modify the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Explain how SSE (Server-Sent Events) are handled and parsed
userStories.notes: Created frontend/README.md with details on app structure, state, and SSE.
